#summary 必也正名乎

= 必也正名乎 =

子曰：必也正名乎! 名不正则言不顺,言不顺则事不成。（论语子路篇第十三）

要特别重视代码中各种名字：函数名，类名，常量名，变量名，宏名等等。要取适当的有意义的名字。更广泛的意义上讲，应该使用适当的运算符，符号，记号，以至于适当的语法格式。程序"名不正"，代码就会“言不顺”, 就会影响程序理解，影响设计思路，导致代码错误，也就影响到项目的成败。
名字取好了，可以省略很多注释。反过来，注释的存在很大部分就是因为没有取好名字。

公式一：程序=算法+数据结构;
公式二：程序=名字+结构.

What is necessary is to rectify names。  (Confucian Analects - Chapter 13)
Confucious said: 
"What is necessary is to rectify names。"
"If names be not correct, language is not in accordance with the truth of things. If language be not in accordance with the truth of things, affairs cannot be carried on to success."

We should pay more attention to all kinds of names in code: the names of functions, classes, constants, variables, macros, etc. Give them meaningful names. To a greater extent, we should use right operators, symbols, marks, even well formed syntax. Without correct names, the code would be not in order, and would be misunderstood, and the design may be suspicious. If so, more errors may exist in the code, and the project may fail at last.
With good names, we can save many comments. on contrast, the comments are there just because naming things too bad.

Formula 1. program = algorithm + data structure.
Formula 2. program = name + structure.
